titles.title: SF282 Stay here where nails are driven

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
This is where faith discovers
the length to which Love goes;
this is where grief uncovers
the deepest truth Love knows:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The joy of faith, though dying,
springs up for ever new;
its song breaks out from crying,
and sorrow keeps it true.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So wait, where pain and grieving
engulf complacency,
in earth's despair believing
the truth of Calvary.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Then see, through desolation,
how grief and joy are tuned
to rise in exultation
because of Love's deep wound.
